subject: Doping (Sports)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The three-time Tour de France champion could still face appeals from the International Cycling Union and the World Anti-Doping Agency over his failed test last summer.
snippet: The three-time Tour de France champion could still face appeals from the International Cycling Union and the World Anti-Doping Agency over his failed test last summer.
